mapper.sql: TRANSPORTER_LICENSE_ID, TRANSPORTER_ID, PLATR_CODE, TRANSPORTER_TYPE, OWNER, ADDRESS, USE_TYPE, BRAND_MODER, VIN, ENGINE_CODE, REGIST_DATE, ISSUED_DATE, VALID_UNTIL, FILE_CODE, LOAD_NUMBER, TOTAL_QUALITY, HOSTLING_QUALITY, LOAD_QUALITY, EXTERNAL_SIZE, PULL_TOTAL_QUALITY, REMARK, IMAGE_PATH, BILL_STATUS, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, CHECKER, CHECK_DATE, CORP_ID, FLAG

tl.TRANSPORTER_LICENSE_ID, tl.TRANSPORTER_ID,tr.TRANSPORTER_CODE,tr.TRACTIR_PLATE_CODE, tr.TRAILER_PLATE_CODE, tl.PLATR_CODE, tl.TRANSPORTER_TYPE, tl.OWNER, tl.ADDRESS, tl.USE_TYPE, tl.BRAND_MODER, tl.VIN, tl.ENGINE_CODE, tl.REGIST_DATE, owner.USER_NAME as OWNER_NAME,owner.USER_CODE as OWNER_CODE,tl.ISSUED_DATE, tl.VALID_UNTIL, tl.FILE_CODE, tl.LOAD_NUMBER, tl.TOTAL_QUALITY, tl.HOSTLING_QUALITY, tl.LOAD_QUALITY, tl.EXTERNAL_SIZE, tl.PULL_TOTAL_QUALITY, tl.REMARK, tl.IMAGE_PATH, tl.BILL_STATUS, tl.CREATOR,creator.USER_NAME as CREATE_NAME, tl.CREATE_DATE, tl.CHECKER,checker.USER_NAME as CHECKER_NAME,tl.CHECK_DATE, tl.CORP_ID,corp.CORP_NAME, tl.FLAG
tl.TRANSPORTER_LICENSE_ID, owner.USER_ID as OWNER_NAME,owner.USER_CODE as OWNER_CODE,tr.TRANSPORTER_CODE, tl.PLATR_CODE, tl.BILL_STATUS,tl.TRANSPORTER_TYPE,tl.USE_TYPE

where tl.del = 0 and tl.TRANSPORTER_LICENSE_ID = #{transporterLicenseId} and tl.TRANSPORTER_ID = #{transporterId} and ( tl.PLATR_CODE = #{platrCode} or tl.PLATR_CODE like concat(concat('%',#{platrCode}),'%') ) and( tl.TRANSPORTER_TYPE = #{transporterType} or tl.TRANSPORTER_TYPE like concat(concat('%',#{transporterType}),'%') ) and ( owner.USER_NAME = #{refOwner} or owner.USER_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{refOwner}),'%') ) and tl.OWNER = #{owner} or tl.OWNER like concat(concat('%',#{owner}),'%') and tl.ADDRESS = #{address} and tl.USE_TYPE = #{useType} and tl.BRAND_MODER = #{brandModer} and tl.VIN = #{vin} and tl.ENGINE_CODE = #{engineCode} and tl.REGIST_DATE = #{registDate} and tl.ISSUED_DATE = #{issuedDate} and ( tl.VALID_UNTIL = #{validUntil} or tl.VALID_UNTIL <= #{validUntil} ) and ( tl.FILE_CODE = #{fileCode} or tl.FILE_CODE like concat(concat('%',#{fileCode}),'%') ) and tl.LOAD_NUMBER = #{loadNumber} and tl.TOTAL_QUALITY = #{totalQuality} and tl.HOSTLING_QUALITY = #{hostlingQuality} and tl.LOAD_QUALITY = #{loadQuality} and tl.EXTERNAL_SIZE = #{externalSize} and tl.PULL_TOTAL_QUALITY = #{pullTotalQuality} and tl.REMARK = #{remark} and tl.IMAGE_PATH = #{imagePath} and tl.BILL_STATUS = #{billStatus} and tl.CREATOR = #{creator} and tl.CREATE_DATE = #{createDate} and tl.CHECKER = #{checker} and tl.CHECK_DATE = #{checkDate} and tl.CORP_ID = #{corpId} and tl.FLAG = #{flag} and ( tr.TRAILER_PLATE_CODE like concat(concat('%',#{refTrailerPlateCode}),'%') or tr.TRAILER_PLATE_CODE like concat(concat('%',#{refTrailerPlateCode}),'%') ) and ( owner.USER_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{searchContent}),'%') or tr.TRAILER_PLATE_CODE like concat(concat('%',#{searchContent}),'%') ) and tl.CREATE_DATE >= #{startTime} and tl.CREATE_DATE <= #{endTime}
mapper.select: select from tc_transporter_license tl join SYS_CORP corp on corp.CORP_ID = tl.CORP_ID join bd_user creator ON creator.USER_ID = tl.creator join bd_user owner ON owner.USER_ID = tl.OWNER left join bd_user checker ON checker.USER_ID = tl.checker join tc_transporter tr on tr.TRANSPORTER_ID = tl.TRANSPORTER_ID where tl.del = 0 and tl.TRANSPORTER_LICENSE_ID = #{transporterLicenseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into tc_transporter_license (TRANSPORTER_ID, PLATR_CODE, TRANSPORTER_TYPE, OWNER, ADDRESS, USE_TYPE, BRAND_MODER, VIN, ENGINE_CODE, REGIST_DATE, ISSUED_DATE, VALID_UNTIL, FILE_CODE, LOAD_NUMBER, TOTAL_QUALITY, HOSTLING_QUALITY, LOAD_QUALITY, EXTERNAL_SIZE, PULL_TOTAL_QUALITY, REMARK, IMAGE_PATH, BILL_STATUS, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, CHECKER, CHECK_DATE, CORP_ID, FLAG) values (#{transporterId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{platrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transporterType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{owner,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandModer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{engineCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{issuedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{validUntil,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fileCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loadNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalQuality,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{hostlingQuality,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{loadQuality,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{externalSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pullTotalQuality,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imagePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{checker,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{checkDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into tc_transporter_license TRANSPORTER_ID, PLATR_CODE, TRANSPORTER_TYPE, OWNER, ADDRESS, USE_TYPE, BRAND_MODER, VIN, ENGINE_CODE, REGIST_DATE, ISSUED_DATE, VALID_UNTIL, FILE_CODE, LOAD_NUMBER, TOTAL_QUALITY, HOSTLING_QUALITY, LOAD_QUALITY, EXTERNAL_SIZE, PULL_TOTAL_QUALITY, REMARK, IMAGE_PATH, BILL_STATUS, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, CHECKER, CHECK_DATE, CORP_ID, FLAG, #{transporterId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{platrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transporterType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{owner,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandModer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{engineCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{issuedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{validUntil,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fileCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loadNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalQuality,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{hostlingQuality,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{loadQuality,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{externalSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pullTotalQuality,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imagePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{checker,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{checkDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update: update tc_transporter_license TRANSPORTER_ID = #{transporterId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, PLATR_CODE = #{platrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANSPORTER_TYPE = #{transporterType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OWNER = #{owner,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USE_TYPE = #{useType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BRAND_MODER = #{brandModer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VIN = #{vin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENGINE_CODE = #{engineCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGIST_DATE = #{registDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISSUED_DATE = #{issuedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, VALID_UNTIL = #{validUntil,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FILE_CODE = #{fileCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOAD_NUMBER = #{loadNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TOTAL_QUALITY = #{totalQuality,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, HOSTLING_QUALITY = #{hostlingQuality,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, LOAD_QUALITY = #{loadQuality,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, EXTERNAL_SIZE = #{externalSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PULL_TOTAL_QUALITY = #{pullTotalQuality,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMAGE_PATH = #{imagePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BILL_STATUS = #{billStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CHECKER = #{checker,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CHECK_DATE = #{checkDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, where TRANSPORTER_LICENSE_ID = #{transporterLicenseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tc_transporter_license set TRANSPORTER_ID = #{transporterId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, PLATR_CODE = #{platrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANSPORTER_TYPE = #{transporterType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OWNER = #{owner,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USE_TYPE = #{useType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BRAND_MODER = #{brandModer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VIN = #{vin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENGINE_CODE = #{engineCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGIST_DATE = #{registDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISSUED_DATE = #{issuedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, VALID_UNTIL = #{validUntil,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FILE_CODE = #{fileCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOAD_NUMBER = #{loadNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TOTAL_QUALITY = #{totalQuality,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, HOSTLING_QUALITY = #{hostlingQuality,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, LOAD_QUALITY = #{loadQuality,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, EXTERNAL_SIZE = #{externalSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PULL_TOTAL_QUALITY = #{pullTotalQuality,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMAGE_PATH = #{imagePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BILL_STATUS = #{billStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CHECKER = #{checker,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CHECK_DATE = #{checkDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where TRANSPORTER_LICENSE_ID = #{transporterLicenseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tc_transporter_license BILL_STATUS = #{billStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CHECKER = #{checker,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CHECK_DATE = #{checkDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, where TRANSPORTER_LICENSE_ID = #{transporterLicenseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update tc_transporter_license set DEL = 1 where TRANSPORTER_LICENSE_ID = #{transporterLicenseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update tc_transporter_license set DEL = 1 WHERE TRANSPORTER_LICENSE_ID in #{item,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select from tc_transporter_license tl join SYS_CORP corp on corp.CORP_ID = tl.CORP_ID join bd_user creator ON creator.USER_ID = tl.creator join bd_user owner ON owner.USER_ID = tl.OWNER left join bd_user checker ON checker.USER_ID = tl.checker join tc_transporter tr on tr.TRANSPORTER_ID = tl.TRANSPORTER_ID order by tl.CREATE_DATE DESC

select from tc_transporter_license tl join SYS_CORP corp on corp.CORP_ID = tl.CORP_ID join bd_user creator ON creator.USER_ID = tl.creator join bd_user owner ON owner.USER_ID = tl.OWNER left join bd_user checker ON checker.USER_ID = tl.checker join tc_transporter tr on tr.TRANSPORTER_ID = tl.TRANSPORTER_ID order by ${orderByClause}
